summary: Diff implements a new global facility lighting preset in FacilityWorld, adjusts renderer tone mapping/exposure/background in GameView, and hardens overlays so Hood vignette is subtle and FadeToBlack is inactive unless explicitly activated. No clear BuildRequest requirements appear unimplemented based on the provided diff summary. Some non-requested project metadata/docs files were also modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state updated (project_state.json) despite request being a lighting-only retry with no mention of updating project state artifacts.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on lighting/exposure/overlays changes; modifying project tracking metadata is not requested and not required to satisfy REQ-17/18/19.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend file summary artifact updated (frontend-file-summaries.txt) though not requested as part of lighting preset changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request updating summary/documentation artifacts; only gameplay rendering/overlay behavior changes are requested.
